name: The Ritz-Carlton, Chicago
context: Luxury hotel in Chicago's Gold Coast. Client entertainment facility with private dining rooms and meeting spaces. Chosen for high-profile client meetings requiring prestigious location.

name: Hilton Chicago
context: Historic hotel in Chicago's Loop district. Preferred brand with corporate rates. Convenient location near business district and public transportation.

name: The Langham, Boston
context: Luxury hotel in Boston's Financial District. Preferred brand with corporate rates. Walking distance to client offices and conference venues. Includes business center and meeting rooms.

name: Boston Marriott Copley Place
context: Modern hotel in Boston's Back Bay. Preferred brand with excellent corporate rates. Connected to shopping and dining complex. Includes fitness center and business amenities.

name: The Savoy, London
context: Historic luxury hotel in Covent Garden. Chosen for prestigious location and client entertainment facilities. Walking distance to business district and cultural attractions.

name: Marriott Marquis San Francisco
context: Modern hotel in San Francisco's SOMA district. Preferred brand with corporate rates. Convenient location near Moscone Center and tech companies. Includes business center and meeting facilities.
